reviewText: Our family has grown tired of the filth that is on TV and decided to discontinue our TV service.  Although there are episodes of Everybody Loves Raymond i.e., "Just Say No" & "Halloween Candy," that are less than ideal for family viewing, they are, by and large, family-friendly and endlessly entertaining.  We watch the DVD's daily and never grow tired of them or not having TV service!
